title: Haseeb Hassan
text:
Haseeb Hassan (sometimes Haseeb Hasan; ) is veteran Pakistani television drama and <a href="film%20director">film director</a>. He is known for depicting brilliant & un-touched stories and events through his dramas like <a href="Alif%20%28TV%20series%29">Alif</a>, <a href="Dhoop%20Ki%20Deewar">Dhoop Ki Deewar</a>, <a href="Mann%20Mayal">Mann Mayal</a>, <a href="Aahista%20Aahista">Ahista Ahista</a>, <a href="Dayar-e-Dil">Dayar-e-Dil</a> and <a href="Bol%20Meri%20Machli">Bol Meri Machli</a>. He is also into film/movie direction and has directed movies like <a href="Parwaz%20Hai%20Junoon">Parwaz Hai Junoon</a> which received many awards including <a href="18th%20Lux%20Style%20Awards">18th Lux Style Awards</a>.
Career.
Haseeb Hasan is a famous Pakistani television drama and film director who was born on 8 January 1977. He is highly appreciated for all of his productions around the world. He started with small projects in 1998 and worked his way up to famous projects like ‘Parwaz Hai Junoon.’
He has worked in collaboration with Hum and Geo. Even though he can make magic, Haseeb is excellent at turning novels and true events into a visual experience for his audience. His collaboration with renowned writers <a href="Umera%20Ahmad">Umera Ahmad</a> <a href="Farhat%20Ishtiaq">Farhat Ishtiaq</a> <a href="Samira%20Fazal">Samira Fazal</a> <a href="Asghar%20Nadeem%20Syed">Asghar Nadeem Syed</a> have all been a major success.
In 2008, he joined <a href="Geo%20Tv">Geo Tv</a> as Executive Producer and Director, to collaborate and work on exciting projects, that leave the audience in awe. He's also worked with <a href="ARY%20Digital">ARY Digital</a> as a Director and Producer between 2003 and 2008.
After all that success and experience he has successfully inaugurated ‘Hamdan Films’ a Broadcasting and Media Production house that will transform Pakistan's Media Industry and take everyone by the storm.
<a href="Dayar-e-Dil">Dayar-e-Dil</a> <a href="Nanhi">Nanhi</a> <a href="Mann%20Mayal">Mann Mayal</a> <a href="Bol%20Meri%20Machlee">Bol Meri Machlee</a> and highest-grossing film of 2018 <a href="Parwaaz%20Hai%20Junoon">Parwaaz Hai Junoon</a> all are multiple award-winning projects. After having a blockbuster film & more than a dozen dramas in his name, he made a venture with digital world India to produce his web series <a href="Dhoop%20ki%20Deewar">Dhoop ki Deewar</a> which is now being aired on Zee5. Series <a href="Dhoop%20ki%20Deewar">Dhoop ki Deewar</a> is written by famous novel & drama writer <a href="Umera%20Ahmad">Umera Ahmad</a> and this series reflects the living conditions of the families of the martyrs during the war, their difficulties, dreams and obstacles to reach their dreams.
